amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the application of the bill's provisions regarding the posting of financial disclosure forms on the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-167 to make technical corrections to the text of the bill. In addition, it would permit Members to omit personally identifiable information not required to be disclosed on the reports posted on the Internet by the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
